function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Socioeconomic inequalities and healthcare disparities amplified by digital health initiatives.","Impact":"Exacerbation of existing disparities, affecting access to healthcare and health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Tailoring interventions to target regions, subsidizing mobile phone plans, loaner devices, and free Wi-Fi hotspots in low-income areas.","Technologies":"Broadband access, automated applications and devices that do not require continuous network access.","People":"Susceptible groups in low-income neighborhoods, remote regions, individuals with restricted access to technology.","Owner":"Government, private sector, technology companies."},{"Description":"Privacy infringement and increased risk among individuals with mental illness or restricted access to necessities.","Impact":"Fear, threat to civil liberties, and exacerbation of health risk for vulnerable populations.","Mitigation":"Retention of data for a limited period, implementation of opt-in smartphone tracking with anonymized data and no central database.","Technologies":"Opt-in smartphone tracking application with anonymized data and no central database.","People":"Individuals with mental illness, restricted access to necessities.","Owner":"Government, technology companies, healthcare organizations."}]}
